SimpleClientEntity Namespace Reference

This namespace contains functions for dealing with simple client entities implemented by a Python object, with methods and properties in the natural way. More...

Detailed Description

This namespace contains functions for dealing with simple client entities implemented by a Python object, with methods and properties in the natural way.

Update the identified property on the given entity.

Returns true if the property was found to update.
